answers.answer: Here's a suggestion: how about getting the well water tested if you feel that is a source of toxification for your sister, since unfortunately the doctors aren't cooperating by testing her?Regarding the constipation- may I ask what steps are being taken to try to rectify this bowel irregularity?Have they bothered to do a brain scan to check for actual proof positive of stroke or a brain tumor?  A relative of mine had a TIA and the did a brain scan which actually showed an old infarct in the brain.What about her TSH, free T 3 and T 4 (hyperthyroidism can cause weight loss)?  Is she drinking Ensure or taking any measures to try to regain the weight?  Have they checked her blood sugar level to make sure she hasn't developed diabetes (weight loss can be a symptom).  Have they checked her for cancer (weight loss can be a symptom).Have they checked her blood iron & ferritin levels (from what I see on the web, low iron can cause paleness, intestinal problems, and cognitive problems, like impaired learning ability).

question: my sister was told a year ago that she had had a stroke because she had some type of aphasia. she is getting steadily worse and now she was told it was alzheimers and yet again, cognitive brain dysfunction. she can hardly make a sentence, has lost so much weight, looks pale, is constipated, has gastrointestinal troubles And they get their water from a well. i have asked her doctors about testing her and they still won't do it. i can't understand why not.
